mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", o2.name AS "office.name", o2.type AS "office.type", a.addr_id AS "bizLocation.id", c.province_id as "bizLocation.province.id", province.name as "bizLocation.province.name", c.city_id as "bizLocation.city.id", city.name as "bizLocation.city.name", c.region_id as "bizLocation.region.id", reg.name as "bizLocation.region.name", c.address as "bizLocation.address", c.longitude as "bizLocation.longitude", c.latitude as "bizLocation.latitude", a.receiver as "receiver", a.phone as "phone", a.type AS "type", a.default_status AS "deFaultStatus", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"

LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id=a.office_id left join sys_user su on su.id=a.create_id LEFT JOIN common_location c ON c.id=a.addr_id LEFT JOIN sys_region province ON c.province_id = province.id LEFT JOIN sys_region city ON c.city_id = city.id LEFT JOIN sys_region reg ON c.region_id = reg.id LEFT JOIN biz_custom_center_consultant ccs ON ccs.cust_id=a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office s on s.id=ccs.center_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office_address( id, office_id, addr_id, receiver, phone, `type`, default_status, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{bizLocation.id}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{deFaultStatus}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office_address SET office_id = #{office.id}, addr_id = #{bizLocation.id}, receiver = #{receiver}, phone = #{phone}, `type` = #{type}, default_status = #{deFaultStatus}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
